ygData.subject: Re: Brass
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Or, my personal choice: The cave in the tunnel between the Commonlands and Ro.  Go ALL the way in the back, fire it up, and go to sleep.  Of course, 8
ygData.messageBody:
At 01:27 PM 9/3/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: Ryan Honeyman <slasher@...>
>
>>This has probably been asked before, but HOW IN THE
>>WORLD can one practice Brass? It seems that unless
>>you are actually damaging something, brass skill won't
>>go up.
>
>The Arena + A brass horn + DDD + 4-8 hours = max brass skill.
>
>Harmonic Distortion, 31st ding.
>League of Antonican Bards, The Wind Spirit's Song
>< Keepers of Norrath > Innoruuk

Or, my personal choice:
The cave in the tunnel between the Commonlands and Ro. Go ALL the way in
the back, fire it up, and go to sleep. Of course, 8 hours later, mine
STILL didn't max out - but after some time in Freeport killing rats,
beatles, bats and snakes, it was maxed ;) *I* still can't figure out how
to practice Wind, though - Tarew's hasn't been moving my wind skill - only
Cindra's Charismatic Carrillon does, but even that is about 1/ hour :P

Talies the Wanderer
